title: Moms Against Gambling founder discusses potential detrimental effects of sports betting to young people
text:
Moms Against Gambling founder discusses potential detrimental effects of sports betting to young people
Published: Feb. 20, 2025 at 5:31 PM EST|Updated: seconds ago
SAVANNAH, Ga. (WTOC) - For years many have been lobbying Georgia lawmakers to legalize sports betting.
It came very close to getting on the ballot last year.
You may not have known though that some grassroots organizations are banning together to stop it.
The founder and president of Moms Against Gambling, Jeanne Seaver, joins WTOCâ€™s Dawn Baker on Welcome to our Community to talk about why sports betting could be detrimental to young people.
